title: BACKWATER
description: A mysterious stranger turns up living in a derelict house on the cliff edge near a small sleepy backwater village. No-one knows who he is and where he has come from. Why is he in hiding? As he restores the building he finds a Diary that starts a train of violent deaths in the surrounding area. He himself begins to have somnambulism events that result in him waking up drowning in the sea. Savage violence erupts around him.What terrible history is hidden in that house that no-one wants revealed?
author: Felicity Lennie
